title: Kiya Pupa
text:
Hello!
Thanks for visiting my personal website. My name is Rylee Pupa and I’m a senior Environmental Studies student at UC Santa Barbara. I’ll be graduating in Spring 2023 with a Bachelor of Science degree in Environmental Studies, with a concentration in Geographic Information Systems. After graduation I’ll be working as a GIS Intern on the Grid-Scale Renewables Team at ENGIE North America.

title: Kiya Pupa
text:
Education
University of California, Santa Barbara | Santa Barbara, CA | Bachelor of Science in Environmental Studies | GPA 3.9 | Sept 2019 - June 2023
Lund University | Lund, Sweden | GIS Exchange Semester | August 2022 – January 2023

title: Background
text: Climate Change Mitigation Strategies, Environmental Impact Analysis, Green Building, Infrastructure and the Environment, Advanced Geographic Information Systems, GIS for Environmental Applications, Renewable Energy Systems, Environmental Toxicology, Exploring Water Data with R, Linear Algebra, Statistics, Calculus
